be.ordina.unitils.testing.util
Class ReflectionAssert

java.lang.Object
  be.ordina.unitils.testing.util.ReflectionAssert

public class ReflectionAssert
extends java.lang.Object

A class for asserting that 2 objects are equals by comparing all fields of the objects using reflection.

Method Detail

assertEquals

public static void assertEquals(java.lang.Object expected,
                                java.lang.Object actual)
                         throws junit.framework.AssertionFailedError
Asserts that two objects are equal. If they are not an AssertionFailedError is thrown with the given message. Reflection is used to compare all fields of the given objects

Parameters:
expected - the expected object
actual - the given object
Throws:
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError - when both objects are not equals

assertEquals

public static void assertEquals(java.lang.String message,
                                java.lang.Object expected,
                                java.lang.Object actual)
                         throws junit.framework.AssertionFailedError
Asserts that two objects are equal. If they are not an AssertionFailedError is thrown with the given message. Reflection is used to compare all fields of the given objects

Parameters:
message - the message for the AssertionFailedError when not equals
expected - the expected object
actual - the given object
Throws:
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError - when both objects are not equals
